channel.title: Raise the Level Maximum?
channel.description: Currently, my server is maxed at 99. How do I go about getting it to 157 or whatever the max is?

item.title: Raise the Level Maximum?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Change both 99’s to whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Raise the Level Maximum?
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

[quote=“Achpoques, post:3, topic:270947”]Ok, so what do I do with it? Increase the xp and level amount?

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } [/quote]
return 99; change that i think and the lvl <= 99 change to lvl u want

Read full topic

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; }
